Chrono module¶

class Chrono.Minuteur[source]¶

Bases: object

This class is used to create a timer.

affichage()[source]¶

This method is used to display the timer.

pauser()[source]¶

This method is used to pause the timer.

run()[source]¶

This method is used to start the timer.
